header.introduction: I combine creativity with technology, delivering modern and effective web solutions.

aboutMe.one: I am a front-end developer with one and a half years of experience. My adventure with coding started out of curiosity and turned into a passion. I have worked on a variety of projects, from simple business card pages to advanced web applications, gaining valuable experience with clients.
aboutMe.two: I create responsive, intuitive and aesthetically pleasing websites and web applications, taking care of every detail from interface design to implementation of the finished product.
aboutMe.three: I am open to new challenges and always ready to learn, believing that technical proficiency, creativity and continuous development are key to success in this industry.

projects.aboutBurrito: An app for ordering food from restaurants with features for creating an account, editing a profile and viewing order history.
projects.aboutPainted: Children's animation company website, with an intuitive interface, information about services and a photo gallery.
projects.aboutPortfolio: A portfolio site with detailed descriptions of my projects, information about me and contact information with and form.
projects.aboutEltom: A website an electrical company, with a modern design,  designed by me, information about services and a contact form.

contact.contactText: Do you have questions about my work, want to collaborate or hire me for your project? Get in touch with me! I will be happy to answer any questions.
